message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper is about natural language processing (NLP) and specifically focuses on improving multi-sense word embeddings using multilingual context. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses Bayesian non-parametric algorithms, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper uses a data-driven approach to learn a variable number of senses per word, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions experiments and performance evaluation, which suggests the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). Finally, the paper discusses leveraging multilingual corpora, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR).
